administrators.pageDescription: Manage administrator accounts for Copilot Admin dashboard access
administrators.roleDescription_super_admin: Full platform access. Can manage all users, settings, tenants, and infrastructure.
administrators.roleDescription_platform_engineer: Infrastructure operations. Manages deployments, scaling, and service health.
administrators.roleDescription_account_manager: Customer success. Scoped to assigned tenants, can manage tenant users.
administrators.roleDescription_compliance_auditor: Security and compliance. Read-only access to audit logs and compliance reports.
administrators.roleDescription_support_tier_3: Engineering support. Code access, log viewing, production debugging, and hotfix capabilities.
administrators.roleDescription_support_tier_2: Escalation support. Cross-tenant access, view-as-user, can edit preferences and export data.
administrators.roleDescription_support_tier_1: Frontline support. Assigned tenants only, can view users and conversations, escalate to Tier 2.
administrators.roleDescription_viewer: Read-only access to dashboards and reports.
administrators.addUserDescription: Send an invitation to a new administrator
administrators.deleteUserDescription: Are you sure you want to remove {name}? This action cannot be undone.

dialog.title: Administrator Details: {name}
dialog.description: View and manage administrator profile and activity

settings.themeHint: Choose between light and dark mode, or follow your system preference
settings.emailUpdatesHint: Receive important updates about your account via email
settings.systemAlertsHint: Get notified about system maintenance and critical issues
settings.weeklyDigestHint: Receive a weekly summary of activity and reports

settings.deleteUserDescription: Are you sure you want to remove {name}? This action cannot be undone.

settings.roleDescription_compliance_auditor: Security and compliance. Read-only access to audit logs and compliance reports.
settings.roleDescription_support_tier_3: Engineering support. Code access, log viewing, production debugging, and hotfix capabilities.
settings.roleDescription_support_tier_2: Escalation support. Cross-tenant access, view-as-user, can edit preferences and export data.
settings.roleDescription_support_tier_1: Frontline support. Assigned tenants only, can view users and conversations, escalate to Tier 2.
settings.roleDescription_viewer: Read-only access to dashboards and reports.
settings.rolesOverviewDescription: Understanding the different administrator roles and their capabilities
settings.profileSavedDescription: Your profile has been updated successfully
settings.preferencesSavedDescription: Your preferences have been updated successfully

preferencesSection.title: User Preferences

workspaces.onlyOwnerCanDelete: Only the owner can delete this workspace

sessions.title: Active Sessions
sessions.description: Monitor and manage user's login sessions across devices
sessions.pastSessionsDescription: Previously active sessions that have expired or been revoked
sessions.securityNoteText: Revoking sessions will force the user to log in again on those devices. A notification will be sent to affected clients.
sessions.cannotRevokeCurrentDescription: You cannot end the session you are currently using. Use a different session or sign out normally.

dialog.title: User Details: {name}
dialog.description: View and manage user profile, tenants, workspaces, and billing

billing.grantSubscriptionDescription: Manually grant a subscription to this user
billing.reasonPlaceholder: Enter reason for grant (e.g., Partner program)

roleDescriptions.owner: Full control over the tenant. Can manage billing, invite/remove users, and delete the organization.
roleDescriptions.admin: Can manage users, workspaces, and most settings. Cannot access billing or delete the organization.
roleDescriptions.member: Can participate in workspaces and access shared resources. Cannot manage users or settings.
roleDescriptions.viewer: Read-only access to shared resources. Cannot create or modify content.

permissionsSection.title: User Permissions
permissionsSection.description: Manage permissions and access for this user across their tenant memberships.
permissionsSection.additionalGroupsDescription: Grant extra capabilities beyond the user's role

data_export.name: Data Export
data_export.description: Allow exporting user data and reports

api_access.name: API Access
api_access.description: Allow API key generation and access

permissions.title: Permissions
permissions.description: Manage access permissions for users and roles
permissions.effectivePermissionsDescription: Permissions calculated from role, groups, and individual grants

user_management_full.name: Full User Management
user_management_full.description: Create, edit, delete users and manage their permissions across the platform

user_management_read.name: User Management (Read Only)
user_management_read.description: View user profiles and account information

user_support_basic.name: Basic User Support
user_support_basic.description: View users and help with basic account issues

user_support_advanced.name: Advanced User Support
user_support_advanced.description: Edit user preferences, unlock accounts, and view as user

billing_full.name: Full Billing Access
billing_full.description: View and manage all billing, subscriptions, and payment methods

infrastructure_full.name: Full Infrastructure Access
infrastructure_full.description: Manage deployments, scaling, and service configuration

infrastructure_read.name: Infrastructure (Read Only)
infrastructure_read.description: View infrastructure status and health metrics

tenant_management_full.name: Full Tenant Management

tenant_view_all.name: View All Tenants
tenant_view_all.description: View all tenants across the platform

tenant_view_assigned.name: View Assigned Tenants
tenant_view_assigned.description: View only tenants assigned to your account

cross_tenant_access.name: Cross-Tenant Access
cross_tenant_access.description: Access users and data across multiple tenants

data_export.name: Data Export
data_export.description: Export user data and audit logs for compliance

audit_full.name: Full Audit Access
audit_full.description: View, export, and configure audit logging

audit_read.name: Audit (Read Only)
audit_read.description: View audit logs and compliance reports

compliance_reporting.name: Compliance Reporting
compliance_reporting.description: View and export compliance and audit reports

conversation_full.name: Full Conversation Access
conversation_full.description: View, annotate, delete, and export conversations

conversation_support.name: Conversation Support
conversation_support.description: View conversation content and add annotations

reports_full.name: Full Reports Access
reports_full.description: View, create, export, and schedule reports

support_engineering.name: Support Engineering
support_engineering.description: Access to logs, debugging tools, and production systems

support_tier3_ops.name: Tier 3 Operations
support_tier3_ops.description: Advanced debugging, code access, and hotfix deployment

escalation_tier2.name: Tier 2 Escalation
escalation_tier2.description: Escalate issues to Tier 3 and receive Tier 1 escalations

escalation_tier3.name: Tier 3 Escalation
escalation_tier3.description: Escalate to engineering and receive Tier 2 escalations
